short_summary: Thermal fluid pumps for the CCGS Earl Grey Navy Ship vessel
description: Purchase of thermal fluid pumps for CCGS Earl Grey
full_summary:
### Tender for Thermal Fluid Pumps for CCGS Earl Grey #

**Reference Number:** WS4444095057 
**Publication Date:** 2024-03-06

**Tender Status:** CANCELLED

The Government of Canada invites interested suppliers to submit proposals for the supply of Thermal fluid pumps for the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Earl Grey.

**Commodity and Sector Classification:**
- **UNSPSC Code:** *25111900
- **Description:** Marine craft systems and subassemblies

**Procurement Method:**
- **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Contracting Entity:**
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address:** 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User:**
- **End User Entity:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
- **Address:** 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada

**Technical Specifications:**
- The scope of work includes the supply of Thermal fluid pumps for the CCGS Earl Grey.
- The contracting entity reserves the right to authenticate the specifications and requirements.

**Quotes Evaluation:**
- Proposals will be evaluated according to the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements:**
- This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Delivery Location:**
- Deliveries will be received at the Department of Public Works and Government Services, 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec.

**Contact Information:**
- For information regarding this solicitation, please contact Dale Wadden, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) via email at Dale.Wadden@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL:**
- This notice is available on the Ariba platform at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19005132?extsite=MTkwMDUxMzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19005132?extsite=MTkwMDUxMzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Closing Date:** Note that this tender is C
